airtrafficcontrol.app

Class AirTrafficControlApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • airtrafficcontrol.app.AirTrafficControlApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AirTrafficControlAppForConsole

    public abstract class AirTrafficControlApp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class whose subclasses' instances represent Air Traffic Control apps.

    Air Traffic Control apps have a name, have a developer, have a options menu , have a a database and a reports generator and they run.

    Author:
    Eva Gomes, Hugo Leal, Lucas Andrade

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String appDeveloper
      The app's developer.
      java.lang.String appTitle
      The app's title.
      OptionsMenu mainMenu
      A menu for the app.
      AirTrafficControlAppToolbox tools
      The app's tools (creates the app's flights database and its reports generator).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AirTrafficControlApp(java.lang.String appTitle, java.lang.String appDeveloper, java.lang.String menuTitle, Option... options)
      Creates a new Air Traffic Control app with the name appTitle, the developer appDeveloper, an options menu with the title menuTitle and the options options, a flights' database and a reports generator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AirTrafficControlApp

        public AirTrafficControlApp(java.lang.String appTitle,
                            java.lang.String appDeveloper,
                            java.lang.String menuTitle,
                            Option... options)
                     throws InvalidArgumentException
        Creates a new Air Traffic Control app with
        • the name appTitle,
        • the developer appDeveloper,
        • an options menu with the title menuTitle and the options options,
        • a flights' database and
        • a reports generator.
        Parameters:
        appTitle - This app's name.
        appDeveloper - This app's developer.
        menuTitle - This app's options menu title.
        options - This app's menu's options.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - If null arguments are inserted or if appTitle, appDeveloper or menuTitle are given the empty string ("").

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public abstract void run()
        Runs the app.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
